title: SEPTEMBER ! 2 BED 2 BATH! Daly City, located in San Mateo County~
posting_body: This is the home you've been waiting for!
Large coat closet and pantry upon your entry into the home, and you can definitely spread out in this extra large living room!
Not only does this two bedroom two bathroom floor plan come with plenty of interior storage space but it also has outdoor storage on the balcony.
Enjoy convenience and simple elegance with a few steps to Colma BART station, minutes to Highways 101 and 280, shopping, restaurants, and entertainment.
Get your daily workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center or shoot some hoops in our backyard courts.
Gain peace of mind with our perimeter gated access and underground parking.
